        public static CreatePackageTask from(org.gradle.api.Project project)

      • addAllBundles

        public void addAllBundles()
        All the bundles that this depends on (project and non-project) will be copied into the "install" folder. This is the default behavior.
        See Also:
        addProjectBundles(), addNonProjectBundles(), addNoBundles()

      • addProjectBundles

        public void addProjectBundles()
        Only the project-generated bundles that this depends on will be copied into the "install" folder.
        See Also:
        addAllBundles(), addProjectBundles(), addNonProjectBundles(), addNoBundles()

      • addNonProjectBundles

        public void addNonProjectBundles()
        Only the non-project generated bundles that this depends on be will copied into the "install" folder.
        See Also:
        addAllBundles(), addProjectBundles(), addNoBundles()

      • addNoBundles

        public void addNoBundles()
        None of the bundles that this depends on will be copied into the "install" folder.
        See Also:
        addAllBundles(), addProjectBundles(), addNonProjectBundles()

      • setContentSrc

        public void setContentSrc(java.io.File contentSrc)
        The root of the content tree for files that it will copy into the package. Defaults to `project.file("src/main/content")`
